SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_NEXUS_V3.PRV.STORE" ,"NEXUSTOOL", C, N
! Setting jar class path into variable :SET &UC4RB_NXS_PATH_JAR#= STR_CAT(&$AGENT_RESOURCES_CLIENT#,"nexusv3-tool.jar")

DOCU_Docu.DOC: This includes attaches the nexus jar to current agent It can be used for both Windows and Unix environment
